Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your specific needs. This exceptional item holds a significant value of $10,000 to you, and we're confident it will exceed your expectations. We're offering this remarkable opportunity to you at a special price of $9,500. This is an exclusive deal, tailored to ensure you receive the best value for your investment. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your experience with our top-tier product. Let's discuss further to make this transaction happen. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
